title: Fix vulnerabilities and warnings reported by RustSec
body:
[The RustSec Advisory Database.](https://rustsec.org/)

### The vulnerabilities
- [futures-task: futures_task::noop_waker_ref can segfault due to dereferencing a NULL pointer](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0061)
- [futures-task: futures_task::waker may cause a use-after-free if used on a type that isn't 'static](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0060)
- [futures-util: Improper `Sync` implementation on `FuturesUnordered` in futures-utils can cause data corruption](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0062)
- [smallvec: Double-free and use-after-free in SmallVec::grow()](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2019-0009)
- [smallvec: Memory corruption in SmallVec::grow()](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2019-0012)

All of them were fixed by updating the dependencies. 

### The warnings
- [dirs is unmaintained, use dirs-next instead](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0053)
- [failure is officially deprecated](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0036)
- Crate quote 1.0.2 yanked 
- Crate smallvec 0.6.9 yanked

 Also all the [clippy ](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy) warnings were fixed.
